body: These are default templates, we can edit them however we like, but this gives us a good starting point for working on our project. Since we are working as a group, I thought it would be helpful to have some basic structure to our project.
I agree. Are you thinking projects should be more feature based and less for overall tracking? That makes sense, I haven't had the opportunity to use projects with multiple people before.
With the new logging currently in place in the dev branch, I'll be checking the logs. Try it on the dev site (https://mad-eye-moody.herokuapp.com) and let me know when it happens again.

It appears to be an issue with requesting the access token... I think @richardle798 and I discussed this at some point, but I don't remember
Updated env vars for the callback on the heroku test deploy. If @richardle798 could add it as allowed for spotify, we can test this to make sure it didn't break anything. Otherwise we can just merge.
